<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Targets should implement this method to assign a section to globals with an explicit section specfied.

The implementation of this method can assume that GO-&gt;hasSection() is true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvtargetobjectfile-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvtargetobjectfile-h">SPIRVTargetObjectFile.h</a>.

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Given a constant with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a>, return a section that it should be placed in.

Given a mergable constant with the specified size and relocation information, return a section that it should be placed in.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvtargetobjectfile-h/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvtargetobjectfile-h">SPIRVTargetObjectFile.h</a>.

### Initialize() {#ae666eb4b2b1d9b0e9aca21a686c36b17}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::SPIRVTargetObjectFile::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
This method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

Initialize - this method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

This specifies the current context for codegen, and gives the lowering implementations a chance to set up their default sections.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvtargetobjectfile-h/#l00022">22</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvtargetobjectfile-h">SPIRVTargetObjectFile.h</a>.
